text: @WhiteHouse @SecretaryRoss Trump has surrendered the country to Covid19.  I suppose it mostly just kills those over 65, he must not need their vote.  My kids like their grandparents, I’d like to keep them around. We must open but where's the strategy Mr.Trump? Over 700 dead each day, 21,000 a month.Tulsa?
